ayas.text: atā amrullāhi falā tasta`jilūh ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn
yunazzilul malā-ikata bir rūḥi min amrihi `alā man yashā-u min `ibādihi an andhirū annahu lā ilāha illā ana fattaqūn
khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۚ ta`ālā `ammā yushrikūn
khalaqal-insāna min nuṭfatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīn
wal-an`āma khalaqahā ۗ lakum fīhā dif-un wa manāfi`u wa minhā ta-kulūn
walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūn
wataḥmilu athqālakum ilā baladin lam takūnū bālighīhi illā bishiqqil-anfus ۚ inna rabbakum lara-ūfun raḥīm
wal khayla wal bighāla wal ḥamīra litarkabūhā wazīnah ۚ wayakhluqu mā lā ta`lamūn
wa`alallāhi qaṣdus sabīli wa minhā jā-ir ۚ walaw shā-a lahadākum ajma`īn
huwal ladhī anzala minas samā-i mā-ā ۖ lakum minhu sharābun wa minhu shajarun fīhi tusīmūn
yunbitu lakum bihiz zar`a waz zaytūna wan nakhīla wal-a`nāba wa min kullith thamarāt ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liqawmiy yatafakkarūn
wasakhhara lakumul layla wan nahāra wash shamsa wal qamar ۖ wan nujūmu musakhharātun bi-amrih ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy ya`qilūn
wa mā dhara-a lakum fil-arḍi mukhtalifan alwānuh ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liqawmiy yadhhakkarūn
wahuwal ladhī sakhharal baḥra lita-kulū minhu laḥman ṭariyyan watastakhrijū minhu ḥilyatan talbasūnahā wataral fulka mawākhira fīhi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi wala`allakum tashkurūn
wa-alqā fil-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa-anhāran wasubulal la`allakum tahtadūn
wa`alāmāt ۚ wabin najmi hum yahtadūn
afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluq ۗ afalā tadhakkarūn
wa in ta`uddū ni`matallāhi lā tuḥṣūhā ۗ innallāha laghafūrun raḥīm
wallāhu ya`lamu mā tusirrūna wa mā tu`linūn
wal ladhīna yad`ūna min dūnillāhi lā yakhluqūna shay-an wahum yukhlaqūn
amwātun ghayru aḥyā-i ۖ wa mā yash`urūna ayyāna yub`athūn
ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥid ۚ fal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati qulūbuhum munkiratun wahum mustakbirūn
lā jarama annallāha ya`lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu`linūn ۚ innahu lā yuḥibbul mustakbirīn
wa idhā qīla lahum mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū asāṭīrul-awwalīn
liyaḥmilū awzārahum kāmilatan yawmal qiyāmati wa min awzāril ladhīna yuḍillūnahum bighayri `il-m ۗ alā sā-a mā yazirūn
qad makaral ladhīna min qablihim fa-atallāhu bunyānahum minal qawā`idi fakharra `alayhimus saqfu min fawqihim wa-atāhumul `adhābu min ḥaythu lā yash`urūn
thumma yawmal qiyāmati yukhzīhim wayaqūlu ayna shurakā-iyal ladhīna kuntum tushāqqūna fīhim ۚ qālal ladhīna ūtul `il-ma innal khizyal yawma was sū a `alal-kāfirīn
alladhīna tatawaffāhumul malā-ikatu ẓālimī anfusihim ۖ fa-alqawus salama mā kunnā na`malu min sū-ī ۚ balā innallāha `alīmun bimā kuntum ta`malūn
fadkhulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۖ falabi-sa mathwal mutakabbirīn
waqīla lilladhīnat-taqaw mādhā anzala rabbukum ۚ qālū khayrā ۗ lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihid dunyā ḥasanah ۚ waladārul-ākhirati khayr ۚ walani`ma dārul muttaqīn
jannātu `adniy yadkhulūnahā tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ lahum fīhā mā yashā-ūn ۚ kadhālika yajzillāhul muttaqīn
alladhīna tatawaffāhumul malā-ikatu ṭayyibīna yaqūlūna salāmun `alaykumud-khulul jannata bimā kuntum ta`malūn
hal yanẓurūna illā an ta-tiyahumul malā-ikatu aw ya-tiya amru rabbik ۚ kadhālika fa`alal ladhīna min qablihim ۚ wa mā ẓalamahumullāhu walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn
fa-aṣābahum sayyi-ātu mā `amilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

waqālal ladhīna ashrakū law shā-allāhu mā `abadnā min dūnihi min shay-in naḥnu walā ābā-unā walā ḥarramnā min dūnihi min shay-ī ۚ kadhālika fa`alal ladhīna min qablihim ۚ fahal `alar rusuli illal-balāghul mubīn
walaqad ba`athnā fī kulli ummatin rasūlan ani'-budullāha wajtanibuṭ ṭāghūt ۖ faminhum man hadallāhu wa minhum man ḥaqqat `alayhiḍ ḍalālah ۚ fasīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul mukadhhibīn
in taḥriṣ `alā hudāhum fa-innallāha lā yahdī man yuḍill ۖ wa mā lahum min nāṣirīn
wa-aqsamū billāhi jahda aymānihim lā yab`athullāhu man yamūt ۚ balā wa`dan `alayhi ḥaqqan walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
liyubayyina lahumul ladhī yakhtalifūna fīhi waliya`lamal ladhīna kafarū annahum kānū kādhibīn
innamā qawlunā lishay-in idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūn
wal ladhīna hājarū fillāhi min ba`di mā ẓulimū lanubawwi-annahum fid dunyā ḥasanah ۖ wala-ajrul-ākhirati akbar ۚ law kānū ya`lamūn
alladhīna ṣabarū wa`alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
wa mā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim ۚ fas-alū ahladh dhikri in kuntum lā ta`lamūn
bil bayyināti waz zubur ۗ wa-anzalnā ilaykadh dhikra litubayyina linnāsi mā nuzzila ilayhim wala`allahum yatafakkarūn
afa-aminal ladhīna makarus sayyi-āti an yakhsifallāhu bihimul-arḍa aw ya-tiyahumul `adhābu min ḥaythu lā yash`urūn
aw ya-khudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimu`jizīn
aw ya-khudhahum `alā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum lara-ūfun raḥīm
awalam yaraw ilā mā khalaqallāhu min shay-in yatafayya-u ẓilāluhu `anil yamīni wash shamā-ili sujjadal lillāhi wahum dākhirūn
walillāhi yasjudu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi min dābbatin wal malā-ikatu wahum lā yastakbirūn
yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayaf`alūna mā yu-marūn ۩
waqālallāhu lā tattakhidhū ilāhaynith-nayn ۖ innamā huwa ilāhun wāḥid ۖ fa-iyyāya farhabūn
walahu mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍi walahud dīnu wāṣibā ۚ afaghayrallāhi tattaqūn
wa mā bikum min ni`matin faminallāh ۖ thumma idhā massakumuḍ ḍurru fa-ilayhi taj-arūn
thumma idhā kashafaḍ ḍurra `ankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yushrikūn
liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum ۚ fatamatta`ū ۖ fasawfa ta`lamūn
wayaj`alūna limā lā ya`lamūna naṣīban mimmā razaqnāhum ۗ tallāhi latus-alunna `ammā kuntum taftarūn
wayaj`alūna lillāhil banāti subḥānahu walahum mā yashtahūn
wa idhā bushhira aḥaduhum bil-unthā ẓalla wajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa kaẓīm
yatawārā minal qawmi min sū-i mā bushhira bih ۚ ayumsikuhu `alā hūnin am yadussuhu fit turāb ۗ alā sā-a mā yaḥkumūn
lilladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati mathalus saw-i ۖ walillāhil mathalul-a`lā ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
walaw yu-ākhidhullāhun nāsa biẓul-mihim mā taraka `alayhā min dābbatin walākin yu-akhhiruhum ilā ajalin musammā ۖ fa-idhā jā-a ajaluhum lā yasta-khirūna sā`ah ۖ walā yastaqdimūn
wayaj`alūna lillāhi mā yakrahūna wataṣifu alsinatuhumul kadhiba anna lahumul ḥusnā ۖ lā jarama anna lahumun nāra wa-annahum mufraṭūn
tallāhi laqad arsalnā ilā umamin min qablika fazayyana lahumush shayṭānu a`mālahum fahuwa waliyyuhumul yawma walahum `adhābun alīm
wa mā anzalnā `alaykal kitāba illā litubayyina lahumul ladhikh-talafū fīhi wahudan waraḥmatan liqawmiy yu-minūn
wallāhu anzala minas samā-i mā-an fa-aḥyā bihil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liqawmiy yasma`ūn
wa inna lakum fil-an`āmi la`ibrah ۖ nusqīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihi min bayni farthin wadamin labanan khāliṣan sā-ighal lishhāribīn
wa min thamarātin nakhīli wal-a`nābi tattakhidhūna minhu sakaran warizqan ḥasanā ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liqawmiy ya`qilūn
wa-awḥā rabbuka ilan naḥli anit-takhidhī minal jibāli buyūtan wa minash shajari wa mimmā ya`rishūn
thumma kulī min kullith thamarāti faslukī subula rabbiki dhululā ۚ yakhruju min buṭūnihā sharābun mukhtalifun alwānuhu fīhi shifā-un linnās ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liqawmiy yatafakkarūn
wallāhu khalaqakum thumma yatawaffākum ۚ wa minkum man yuraddu ilā ardhalil `umuri likay lā ya`lama ba`da `il-min shay-ā ۚ innallāha `alīmun qadīr
wallāhu faḍḍala ba`ḍakum `alā ba`ḍin fir rizq ۚ famal ladhīna fuḍḍilū birāddī rizqihim `alā mā malakat aymānuhum fahum fīhi sawā-u ۚ afabini`matil lāhi yajḥadūn
wallāhu ja`ala lakum min anfusikum azwājan waja`ala lakum min azwājikum banīna waḥafadatan warazaqakum minaṭ ṭayyibāt ۚ afabil bāṭili yu-minūna wabini`matillāhi hum yakfurūn
waya`budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yamliku lahum rizqan minas samāwāti wal-arḍi shay-an walā yastaṭī`ūn
falā taḍribū lillāhil-amthāl ۚ innallāha ya`lamu wa-antum lā ta`lamūn
ḍaraballāhu mathalan `abdan mamlūkal lā yaqdiru `alā shay-in wa man razaqnāhu minnā rizqan ḥasanan fahuwa yunfiqu minhu sirran wajahrā ۖ hal yastawūn ۚ al-ḥamdu lillāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn

waḍaraballāhu mathalan rajulayni aḥaduhumā abkamu lā yaqdiru `alā shay-in wahuwa kallun `alā mawlāhu aynamā yuwajjih-hu lā ya-ti bikhayr ۖ hal yastawī huwa wa man ya-muru bil `adli wahuwa `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm
walillāhi ghaybus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wa mā amrus sā`ati illā kalamḥil baṣari aw huwa aqrab ۚ innallāha `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
wallāhu akhrajakum min buṭūni ummahātikum lā ta`lamūna shay-an waja`ala lakumus sam`a wal-abṣāra wal-af-idata la`allakum tashkurūn
alam yaraw ilaṭ ṭayri musakhharātin fī jawwis samā-i mā yumsikuhunna illallāh ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn

wallāhu ja`ala lakum min buyūtikum sakanan waja`ala lakum min julūdil-an`āmi buyūtan tastakhiffūnahā yawma ẓa`nikum wayawma iqāmatikum wa min aṣwāfihā wa-awbārihā wa-ash`ārihā athāthan wa matā`an ilā ḥīn

wallāhu ja`ala lakum mimmā khalaqa ẓilālan waja`ala lakum minal jibāli aknānan waja`ala lakum sarābīla taqīkumul ḥarra wasarābīla taqīkum ba-sakum ۚ kadhālika yutimmu ni`matahu `alaykum la`allakum tuslimūn
fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā `alaykal balāghul mubīn
ya`rifūna ni`matallāhi thumma yunkirūnahā wa-aktharuhumul kāfirūn
wayawma nab`athu min kulli ummatin shahīdan thumma lā yu-dhanu lilladhīna kafarū walā hum yusta`tabūn
wa idhā ra al ladhīna ẓalamul `adhāba falā yukhaffafu `anhum walā hum yunẓarūn
wa idhā ra al ladhīna ashrakū shurakā-ahum qālū rabbanā hā-ulā-i shurakā-unal ladhīna kunnā nad`ū min dūnik ۖ fa-alqaw ilayhimul qawla innakum lakādhibūn
wa-alqaw ilallāhi yawma-idhinis salam ۖ waḍalla `anhum mā kānū yaftarūn
alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi zidnāhum `adhāban fawqal `adhābi bimā kānū yufsidūn
wayawma nab`athu fī kulli ummatin shahīdan `alayhim min anfusihim ۖ waji-nā bika shahīdan `alā hā-ulā-i ۚ wanazzalnā `alaykal kitāba tibyānal likulli shay-in wahudan waraḥmatan wabushrā lil-muslimīn
innallāha ya-muru bil `adli wal-iḥsāni wa-iytā-i dhil qurbā wayanhā `anil faḥshā-i wal munkari wal baghyi ۚ ya`iẓukum la`allakum tadhakkarūn
wa-awfū bi`ahdillāhi idhā `āhadtum walā tanquḍul-aymāna ba`da tawkīdihā waqad ja`altumullāha `alaykum kafīlā ۚ innallāha ya`lamu mā taf`alūn

walā takūnū kal latī naqaḍat ghazlahā min ba`di quwwatin ankāthan tattakhidhūna aymānakum dakhalan baynakum an takūna ummatun hiya arbā min ummah ۚ innamā yablūkumullāhu bih ۚ walayubayyinanna lakum yawmal qiyāmati mā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūn
walaw shā-allāhu laja`alakum ummatan wāḥidatan walākin yuḍillu man yashā-u wayahdī man yashā-u ۚ walatus-alunna `ammā kuntum ta`malūn
walā tattakhidhū aymānakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun ba`da thubūtihā watadhūqus sū a bimā ṣadadtum `an sabīlillāh ۖ walakum `adhābun `aẓīm
walā tashtarū bi`ahdillāhi thamanan qalīlā ۚ innamā `indallāhi huwa khayrul lakum in kuntum ta`lamūn
mā `indakum yanfad ۖ wa mā `indallāhi bāq ۗ walanajziyannal ladhīna ṣabarū ajrahum bi-aḥsani mā kānū ya`malūn
man `amila ṣāliḥan min dhakarin aw unthā wahuwa mu-minun falanuḥyiyannahu ḥayātan ṭayyibah ۖ walanajziyannahum ajrahum bi-aḥsani mā kānū ya`malūn
fa-idhā qara-tal qur-āna fasta`idh billāhi minash shayṭānir rajīm
innahu laysa lahu sulṭānun `alal ladhīna āmanū wa`alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
innamā sulṭānuhu `alal ladhīna yatawallawnahu wal ladhīna hum bihi mushrikūn
wa idhā baddalnā āyatan makāna āyatin wallāhu a`lamu bimā yunazzilu qālū innamā anta muftar ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn
qul nazzalahu rūḥul qudusi min rabbika bil ḥaqqi liyuthabbital ladhīna āmanū wahudan wabushrā lil-muslimīn
walaqad na`lamu annahum yaqūlūna innamā yu`allimuhu bashar ۗ lisānul ladhī yulḥidūna ilayhi a`jamiyyun wahādhā lisānun `arabiyyun mubīn
innal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bi-āyātillāhi lā yahdīhimullāhu walahum `adhābun alīm
innamā yaftaril kadhibal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bi-āyātillāh ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul kādhibūn
man kafara billāhi min ba`di-iymānihi illā man ukriha waqalbuhu muṭma-innun bil-iymāni walākin man sharaḥa bil kufri ṣadran fa`alayhim ghaḍabun minallāhi walahum `adhābun `aẓīm
dhālika bi-annahumus taḥabbul ḥayātad dunyā `alal-ākhirati wa-annallāha lā yahdil qawmal kāfirīn
ulā-ikal ladhīna ṭaba`allāhu `alā qulūbihim wasam`ihim wa-abṣārihim ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul ghāfilūn
lā jarama annahum fil-ākhirati humul khāsirūn
thumma inna rabbaka lilladhīna hājarū min ba`di mā futinū thumma jāhadū waṣabarū inna rabbaka min ba`dihā laghafūrun raḥīm
yawma ta-tī kullu nafsin tujādilu `an nafsihā watuwaffā kullu nafsin mā `amilat wahum lā yuẓlamūn
waḍaraballāhu mathalan qaryatan kānat āminatan muṭma-innatan ya-tīhā rizquhā raghadan min kulli makānin fakafarat bi-an`umillāhi fa-adhāqahallāhu libāsal jū`i wal khawfi bimā kānū yaṣna`ūn
walaqad jā-ahum rasūlun minhum fakadhhabūhu fa-akhadhahumul `adhābu wahum ẓālimūn
fakulū mimmā razaqakumullāhu ḥalālan ṭayyiban washkurū ni`matallāhi in kuntum iyyāhu ta`budūn
innamā ḥarrama `alaykumul maytata wad dama walaḥmal khinzīri wa mā uhilla lighayrillāhi bih ۖ famaniḍ-ṭurra ghayra bāghin walā `ādin fa-innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm
walā taqūlū limā taṣifu alsinatukumul kadhiba hādhā ḥalālun wahādhā ḥarāmul litaftarū `alallāhil kadhib ۚ innal ladhīna yaftarūna `alallāhil kadhiba lā yufliḥūn
matā`un qalīlun walahum `adhābun alīm
wa`alal ladhīna hādū ḥarramnā mā qaṣaṣnā `alayka min qabl ۖ wa mā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn
thumma inna rabbaka lilladhīna `amilus sū a bijahālatin thumma tābū min ba`di dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū inna rabbaka min ba`dihā laghafūrun raḥīm
inna ibrāhīma kāna ummatan qānital lillāhi ḥanīfan walam yaku minal mushrikīn
shākiral li-an`umih ۚ ij-tabāhu wahadāhu ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm
wa-ātaynāhu fid dunyā ḥasanah ۖ wa innahu fil-ākhirati laminaṣ ṣāliḥīn
thumma awḥaynā ilayka anit-tabi` millata ibrāhīma ḥanīfā ۖ wa mā kāna minal mushrikīn
innamā ju`ilas sabtu `alal ladhīnakh-talafū fīh ۚ wa inna rabbaka layaḥkumu baynahum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn
ud-`u ilā sabīli rabbika bil ḥikmati wal maw`iẓatil ḥasanah ۖ wajādilhum bil latī hiya aḥsan ۚ inna rabbaka huwa a`lamu biman ḍalla `an sabīlih ۖ wahuwa a`lamu bil muhtadīn
wa in `āqabtum fa`āqibū bimithli mā `ūqibtum bih ۖ wala-in ṣabartum lahuwa khayrul lilṣṣābirīn
waṣbir wa mā ṣabruka illā billāh ۚ walā taḥzan `alayhim walā taku fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūn
innallāha ma`al ladhīnat-taqaw wal ladhīna hum muḥsinūn
